name: A Cosmic Seed
description:
A Child, sent on a mission to the stars in order to fully test the limits of mankind's reach something went wrong. Your life pod crashed onto a planet, though desolate it appears to be very habitable and a hotspot for some form of mystical energy. Harnessing this power, with the help of refugees from a warring galaxy you start a small civilization and provide shelter for others who are stranded and cast out.
Home, you hope, is a very real possibility. You just have to gather enough materials.
But will you even want to return home?
This is your choice.
